text: Hulaŋ iamɨgali limu hɨhɨle hɨmavɨlalɨ agɨladɨ ahɨliahuiahu saŋ nameŋ lɨhavɨlalɨ uami. Hulaŋ iamɨgali hɨmavɨlalɨ agɨladɨ uvɨsɨjiŋ vivi abavɨdaci avɨli hɨvɨ nulɨdɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahavɨlalɨ uami. Hulaŋ iamɨgali agɨlaŋ hɨmavɨla cɨhu hɨhi ma iahavɨci uami. Ha hulaŋ iamɨgali hɨmavɨlalɨ agɨladɨ uvɨsɨjiŋ vivi saŋ igahɨlahɨla abavɨdaci avɨli hɨvɨ nulɨdɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahaiaha agaŋ nɨbu hɨdɨlɨ apalɨ hɨnivi uami.
